attributes.action: hold an annual vote of all citizens on the Budget for each Government Department
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new Prime Minister has made clear his intention to listen to the people, and to allow all citizens to have a greater say in government decision making. To encourage citizens to be more involved they would be offered a vote in how their taxes are spent, each year.

Voters would be offered a choice of three spending levels for each government department (low, med, high) and the choice with the most votes would become the agreed budget for the forthcoming year. Special arrangements will exist for emergency spending and there will be a contingency provision in each budget for small overspends.
